nodes.text: The Hutt Clan operated a smuggling site on the desert planet of Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War, where goods were smuggled off-world. After Jabba Desilijic Tiure blackmailed Saponza's Gang of the Alliance to Restore the Republic into attacking mercenaries hired by his rivals and then betrayed them, Rebel Colonel Jennica Pierce had Saponza's partner attack the smuggling site as retribution for the betrayal. It was protected by several Autoturrets.
